info.author: Brian Wisti
info.description:
============
Site Builder
============

Site Builder is a command line tool for creating static Web sites. Its primary
purpose is building http://coolnamehere.com, but has been made available on
PyPi in case someone else has a use for similar functionality.

Usage
=====

    $ sitebuilder create example.com
    $ sitebuilder build
    $ sitebuilder clean
    $ sitebuilder publish
info.name: SiteBuilder

Usage
